Authors: Warnars H.L.H.S., Wijaya M.I., Tjung H.B., Xaverius D.F., Van Hauten D., Sasmoko
Title: Easy understanding of Attribute Oriented Induction (AOI) characteristic rule algorithm
Source title: International Journal of Applied Engineering Research
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; PT. Central Santosa Finance, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Yayasan Pendidikan St. Leo, Jakarta, 11170, Indonesia; Database, Data-warehouse & Data Mining Research Center, Surya University, Tangerang, 15810, Indonesia; Research Interest Group in Education Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Warnars, H.L.H.S., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia, Database, Data-warehouse & Data Mining Research Center, Surya University, Tangerang, 15810, Indonesia; Wijaya, M.I., PT. Central Santosa Finance, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Tjung, H.B., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Xaverius, D.F., Yayasan Pendidikan St. Leo, Jakarta, 11170, Indonesia; Van Hauten, D., Database, Data-warehouse & Data Mining Research Center, Surya University, Tangerang, 15810, Indonesia; Sasmoko, Research Interest Group in Education Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This paper is continuation from previous research, where selective generalize attributes is executed in order to find final characteristic rule with execution of Attribute Oriented Induction (AOI) characteristic rule algorithm between line number 9 and 12. This paper gives easy understanding for bachelor and master degree students to understand about AOI characteristic rule algorithm which only implement AOI characteristic rule algorithm between line number 1 and 8. Meanwhile, using threshold in AOI has been known as tedious and consuming work, however in our future research this limitation will be resolved where maximum number of threshold will depend on maximum number of distinct values in dataset. © Research India Publications.
Author Keywords: AOI; Attribute Oriented Induction; Characteristic rule; Concept Hierarchy; Data Mining
